doc.previous: He then moved to Beijing, China,[11] where he lived until 2009. He currently lives in Washington, D.C., where he is an associate professor at American University's School of Communication.[12]
doc.after: Lih is a veteran Wikipedia contributor,[13] and in 2009 published the book The Wikipedia Revolution: How a Bunch of Nobodies Created the World's Greatest Encyclopedia. Lih has been interviewed in a variety of publications, including Salon.com[14] and The New York Times Freakonomics blog,[15] as an expert on Wikipedia.
